message: Do you prefer your iPhone without any case or do you prefere it with case/bumper?
I use bumper style cases to minimize bulk. I have used Apple bumper, CaseMate Hula, and now back to SGP Neo Hybrid EX. I also have a Carbon Fiber back skin as well.
I have never used cases on my iPhones before, but I do like the Apple bumper.
I wish I could go without the case. Much better look and feel. Can't bring myself to do it though because I'm scared of a scratch
No case, just a full body invisibleSHIELD. Gives protection and I find it improves grip too. http://www.iphoneincanada.ca/iphone-accessories/zagg-invisibleshield-iphone-4-review-picture-gallery/

I personally use a wrapsol ultra for the back, a lucky labs and wrapsol ultra for the sides and an SGP ultra crystal for the front. Personally I don't like how the SGP is sticking to the screen and I probably will go back to the wrapsol for the front

I've had mine a few months now, never used a case, and can't find a single mark on it.  Has anyone actually scratched the glass front or back?  My old iPod Touch's metal back got scratched up quite easily, but the iPhone 4 doesn't seem so easily marked.

Since I enjoy shooting video (for video blogging) with the iphone 4, or taking pics of friends/family with me in the shot, I use the XShot.com iphone 4 case (includes mini tripod), and carry around the XShot Extender (like a portable monopod). For my "driveby shootings", I stick the iPhone (in the XShot case) that's on the mini tripod in my SUV dashboard, and start the video while driving :-) You can see some samples on my blog (http://ShermanLive.com). Or if I wanna shoot video of myself (while I'm not driving), I'll connect and use the XShot extender to "shoot myself" on-the-fly :-) Can't recommend it enough, brilliant!
